import React,{useState} from 'react'; import './booking.css'; import { Form, FormGroup, ListGroup, ListGroupItem, Button } from 'reactstrap' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Booking = ({ tour, avgRating }) => { const { price, reviews } = tour; const navigate = useNavigate() const [credentials, setCredentials] = useState({ em }) const handleChange = e => { setCredentials(prev=>({...prev, [e.target.id]:e.target.value})) }; const serviceFee =10 const totalAmount = Number(price) * Number(credentials.guestSize) + Number (serviceFee) //send data tom mthe server const handleClick = e => { e.preventDefault() navigate("/thank-you") } return (

${price} /per person

rm {avgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
{/* ==============booking form========== */}
Information
{/* ==============booking end========== */} {/* ==============booking bottom========== */}
${price} 1 person
${price}
Services charge
${serviceFee}
Total
${totalAmount}
); }; export default Booking;
